title: Data Ingestion
description: Securely connect your Stripe account and AI provider APIs. We automatically pull transaction data, cost metrics, and usage patterns in real-time.

title: AI-Powered Analysis
description: Our advanced algorithms analyze every transaction, attributing costs to specific users and features while identifying profitability patterns and optimization opportunities.

title: Actionable Insights
description: Receive comprehensive dashboards, automated alerts, and strategic recommendations to improve your unit economics and scale profitably.
